text: Angus Deaton (born 19 October 1945) is a Scottish economist. He is from Edinburgh. He won the Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences. He attended Fettes College. He has two children. He also went to Princeton University and the University of Bristol. ==References== ==Other websites== * Angus Deaton's website home page Category:British economists Category:People from Edinburgh Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Nobel Prize in Economics winners
title: Angus Deaton
